page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE(3)
page.content: When School has finished we go home on the bus .At home I get changed into my jeans and have a drink and something to eat. At about 4.15.p.m. a friend comes to call for me, we then go to collect the newspapers ready for delivery.We finish at about 4.45 .It is now time to go home and watch T.V. until my dad comes home ,we then have tea. After tea I usually dry up then I bath my little sister.I may stay in after that or go to the local youth club with my friends.Before Igo to bed I have a bath and then go to bed about 10.30-11.00 p.m.
